      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A bioszféra hasznosítása</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Utilization Of The Biosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anwendung Der Biosphäre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Utilisation de la Biosphère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Utilização Do Biosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Utilizzazione Della Biosfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρησιμοποίηση της βιόσφαιρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Utilización De la Biosfera</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A növénytermesztés, az állattenyésztés, a halászat és az erdőgazdálkodás jellemzőinek bemutatása.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Presenting the Characteristics of Plant Growth, Livestock Breeding, Fishing and Sylviculture.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kultúrnövény</string>
            <string language="en-US">cultivated plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">gabonatermesztés</string>
            <string language="en-US">cereal growing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">állattenyésztés</string>
            <string language="en-US">livestock breeding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">halászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">fishing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen der Eigenschaften des 
Betriebswachstums, des züchtenden Viehs, des Fischens und der 
Forstkultur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des caractéristiques de la 
croissance de plantes, du bétail multipliant, de pêcher et de la 
sylviculture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentando as características do crescimento 
de planta, os animais domésticos que produzem, pescar e o 
sylviculture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentare le caratteristiche di sviluppo di 
pianta, bestiame che allevano, pesca e silvicoltura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των χαρακτηριστικών της αύξησης 
εγκαταστάσεων, της αναπαραγωγής ζωικού κεφαλαίου, της αλιείας και
της δασοπονίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de las características del 
crecimiento vegetal, del ganado que cría, de la pesca y de la 
silvicultura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bebauter Betrieb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Getreidewachsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viehzüchten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fischen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plante cultivée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">croissance de céréale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">multiplication de bétail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pêche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta cultivada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crescimento do cereal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">produzir dos animais domésticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianta coltivata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">crescere del cereale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">allevamento del bestiame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pesca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καλλιεργημένες εγκαταστάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάπτυξη δημητριακών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναπαραγωγή ζωικού κεφαλαίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλιεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">planta cultivada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">crecimiento del cereal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">crianza del ganado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pesca</string>
          </keyword>
